items.text: 136kph short into the ribs, he's cramped on the pull picking out the man in the ring behind square
top spinner on off, he uses the wrists to turn this behind square for a single
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: drifting into leg, he clips this with the drift to the gap forward and square and superb running yields two
very full outside off, he drives neatly through cover-point to the sweeper
looped outside leg, he clips this elegantly to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: wrong un, well bowled, he's hit on the pad, big appeal for LBW and it's given not out. No reviews available
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: tossed up on off, he steps forward and defends
items.postText: AnamBMDF : "BD have dreamt 350+ because of great start from Soumya and partnership between Shakib and Mushfiq. But Tahir's 2 wickets in the middle may set the score below 330 unless exceptional batting from Mahmudullah and Mushfiq are on...."
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: caught at deep point! This is a huge blow for Bangladesh! He advanced and moved leg side, got the short wide ball he was looking for but slapped the cut shot in the air straight to van der Dussen on the rope at backward point and he held the dipping catch well.

dismissal.text: Mushfiqur Rahim c van der Dussen b Phehlukwayo 78 (131m 80b 8x4 0x6) SR: 97.50

items.text: 131kph, back of a length outside off, he sits back and runs this to third man
short and wide, 129kph, he tries to cut but plays over the top of it
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: 132kph, angled down leg and it comes off the thigh and flies fine for four extras! Not a great delivery
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Mosaddek Hossain, 4 leg byes

items.text: 124kph, back of a length outside off, he stands tall and punches off the back foot to deep point
127kph, short ball, he tries to pull getting inside the line but just punches it off the gloves towards fine leg
items.postText: Nick Macklin: "Can't understand all the talk of 330-350. Yes it was a great start to the innings but this is not a pitch where acceleration appears at all easy. England have a longer batting line up and more late order hitters but still never really pushed on, as it turned out 310 was enough. If Bangladesh get 300 they are absolutely right in this game! "

items.text: leg break outside off, he opens the face and runs to short third man, Rabada is forced to make the diving save
wrong un, tossed up, he reads it and defends on the front foot
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: looped up, he drives back to Tahir who can't quite complete the diving save, they pinch one as it rolls past the stumps at the non striker's
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

items.text: shorter wrong un, he's back to create room and punching this to the gap at cover-point
flatter on middle, he's back and covering up in defence
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: googly, quite straight, he's taken on the pad, a big appeal from Tahir only for LBW, given not out. No reviews of course. That was close
items.postText: Imad: "Thanks to Tahir, now we can say SA back in the game"
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: good length, 129kph, wide of off, he late cuts to third man for a single only
130kph, short bouncer, but the pace in this surface is inconsistent, he miscues a pull forward of square
114kph, slower ball, outside off, he tried to work through the off side but drags it back to the bowler
full on leg stump, he flicks this along the ground behind square to the sweeper
top edge over the keeper and it lands just short of the rope! It was a good bouncer, he tried to swat a pull shot over midwicket, got a top edge that flew high and safe for four
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Mosaddek Hossain, FOUR runs

items.text: slaps this pull shot through mid on! No mid on in place with these short balls being banged in, it was wide of off, he reached out and slapped a pull shot through mid on and no one was there to stop it!
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Mosaddek Hossain, FOUR runs
